description: Manages interface DLDP configuration on HUAWEI CloudEngine switches.

reset.description: Specify whether reseting interface DLDP state.

state.description: Manage the state of the resource.

interface.description: Must be fully qualified interface name, i.e. GE1/0/1, 10GE1/0/1, 40GE1/0/22, 100GE1/0/1.

local_mac.description: Set the source MAC address for DLDP packets sent in the DLDP-compatible mode. The value of MAC address is in H-H-H format. H contains 1 to 4 hexadecimal digits.
